title.rendered: Best of the Best + Summer Reading Challenge

content.rendered:
Voted Best of the Best in Middle GA!

This is our first time winning BOTH Macon and Warner Robins. It’s such a privilege to know that Middle Georgia thinks we are #1!
Our employees make the difference… they are the best booksellers we could ever ask for. Thank you, voters… this means so much to us.

http://www.macon.com/news/local/article30227334.html

 

Summer Reading Challenge

Just because you’re out of school doesn’t mean you should stop reading! We invite you to participate in our FIRST EVER Summer Reading Challenge for students entering 1st through 12th grade. Here’s what you do:

1. Pick up a challenge sheet at any of our four Gottwals Books locations.
2. Read!
3. Have a parent/guardian/adult initial the completed squares.
4. If you read books for 10 squares–congratulations! Bring the sheet in to one of our stores and show it off to our staff. You’ve earned a $10 Gottwals Books gift card.
5. If you read for ALL 25 squares and complete the card? You’re a reading champ! Bring the completed card in to one of our stores and we will enter in your name for a GRAND PRIZE drawing.

The deadline will be sometime in early August.

excerpt.rendered: This is our first time winning BOTH Macon and Warner Robins. It’s such a privilege to know that Middle Georgia thinks we are #1!
